Name: Gueu Gildas
description:
Gueu Gildas is a 29-year-old salesman.
Gueu Gildas lives in Ivory Coast with his wife and 2 children.
Gueu Gildas is requesting a loan to buy a solar freezer in order to develop his business by increasing the volume of fish he sells.
Having a solar freezer will also allow Gueu Gildas to reduce his electricity consumption.
Gueu Gildas is therefore planning to sell more in order to expand his shop.
